text: Hi y'all! I'm a 3rd year PhD candidate at MIT studying brain oscillations, and have been thinking about moving my code from MATLAB into Julia for the speed/syntax/aesthetics  : )

Hi Mila. Welcome.  Others who have done so have not looked back.
Here are some packages that may overlap with some of your interest
(ignore the ones that have not been updated in years)
<https://julianeuro.github.io/packages>
